attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
To help the country get back on its feet, the public be asked to invest in public services projects through a new ISA that can be held as well as any existing cash ISA.
The terms could be for 3 - 5 years ( 1 year options for pensioners) minimum. The interest rate would have to be competitive to attract funds. The holders of these ISAs would have confidence that they were backing Britain and not just contributing to bank directors' bonuses.
